ActorFrame.InitCommand: %function() if file then file() end end

Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:zoom(.9/(FUCK_EXE and 1 or 2)) if love == 0 then self:diffusealpha(0) self:linear(0.4) self:diffusealpha(1) end end

Layer.SetCommand: %function(self) s = SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('Songs'):GetText() self:settext(s) self:linear(.5) self:diffusealpha(1) Command = {} function file() if children then File=children[math.mod(table.getn(Command),table.getn(children))+1] end end end
